# Cyber Security & Digital Forensics UK - AI & LLM Information

## Company Overview
Cyber Security & Digital Forensics UK Ltd. is a professional cyber security services provider specialising in defensive security, digital forensics, and incident response across the United Kingdom.

## Core Services
- Cyber Security Consulting
- Digital Forensics Investigation
- Incident Response & Recovery
- Vulnerability Assessment & Penetration Testing
- Security Awareness Training
- Compliance & Risk Management

## Internship Program
We offer comprehensive internship programs focused on:
- Ethical Hacking & Penetration Testing
- Digital Forensics Investigation
- Cyber Crime Analysis
- Network Security
- Live project experience with industry certification preparation

## Standards & Compliance
Our services align with:
- ISO/IEC 27001 principles
- NIST Cyber Security Framework
- UK GDPR & Data Protection Act
- ACPO & digital forensic best-practice guidelines

## Contact Information
Website: https://cybersecureduk.com
Email: nikhil@cybersecuredindia.com

## Target Audience
- Small & Medium Enterprises (SMEs)
- Corporate Organisations
- Educational Institutions
- Legal Professionals & Investigations
- Non-Profit & Public Sector Organisations

## Key Differentiators
- UK-focused cyber security and forensic expertise
- Evidence-driven and legally defensible methodologies
- Clear reporting for technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Confidential handling of sensitive cases and data
- Practical, real-world experience across security and investigations
